meanings.definition: A monetary unit equal to one hundredth of a Romanian leu.
meanings.sent1: I found a shiny santim on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent2: In Romania, you can buy candy with a santim.
meanings.sent3: The santim rolled away, playing hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: The santim glinted like a tiny sun in the palm of my hand.
meanings.sent5: The beggar's eyes lit up when I dropped a santim into his cup.

meanings.definition: A coin worth one hundredth of a Romanian leu.
meanings.sent1: My collection of coins includes a rare santim.
meanings.sent2: The vending machine only accepts coins, even santims.
meanings.sent3: The santim jumped out of my pocket and into the fountain.
meanings.sent4: The santim spun in the air before landing in the charity box.
meanings.sent5: The child's face brightened when I gave him a shiny santim.
